snippet: A court on Thursday fined Nabil Karoui for disrupting public order and violating moral values by broadcasting an animated film that some religious leaders say insults Islam.
abstract: Tunisian court fines Nabil Karoui, the director of a private television station, for disrupting public order and violating moral values by broadcasting an animated film that some religious leaders say insults Islam.
lead_paragraph: A court on Thursday fined Nabil Karoui for disrupting public order and violating moral values by broadcasting an animated film that some religious leaders say insults Islam.

headline.seo: Tunisia: Nabil Karoui Fined Over Controversial Film
headline.main: Tunisia: TV Chief Fined Over a Film
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: TV Chief Fined Over a Film
